content.text:
# Hagiwara-juku

was the fifth of nine post stations along the Minoji. It is located in the present-day city of Ichinomiya, Aichi Prefecture, Japan. Located on the banks of the Nikk≈ç River, Hagiwara-juku was the smallest post station along the Minoji.

;Minoji
